most of the people are so immature they cant even recognise why such bad things happen in their lives. you can do any business but there are many many problems in such people's lives. not only killing is a sin look at the stress they have to go through, as a result then they get addicted to alcohol or women, take huge loans and later when its not payable it and suicide themselves. all these go around and come back to you. as your goal is so high and determined you are willing to loose anything in the way you dont see that as karma ruining your life

I do understand but there is a thing call ecological balance. For instance look at India, Indians do not eat beef and you will see cattle everywhere you go. It is all their personal choices (whether to eat beef, be a butcher or whatever) and what we as a country should do is minding our own things. There won't be anyone to eat at MOC (and eventually close down) if all of the people think that killing Crabs is a sin. "you can do any business but there are many many problems in such people's lives..." as for this I think you should go and work with an ice cream vendor so that you can make all your customers happy. If you got time and cash I highly recommend that you should travel the world and see what is going on in the world and what has happened to us against them(Visit places like Japan, Australia, Peru, and etc) Don't tell me that our country is in this situation is because of the politicians, they have nothing to do with our attitude of complaining about everything and giving excuses!

To my way of thinking, selling ice cream is also a sinful act.There might have huge impacts on your body in the long term. Hence, from Singhalele Buddist's perspective every cause is assaciated with Karma.
Sitha nivena katha
